channel.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins
channel.description:
Title says it all, I am looking for some admins so they can help when the wiki gets spammed with viagra ads. Please note, you have to have been here awhile/have a decent reputation in order to be accepted.
[size=18pt][b]edit:[/b][/size] in case anyone is wondering what this entails: you have to log in every week or so and ban abusers/spammers and revert/delete their changes.
[size=18pt][b]edit2:[/b][/size] [quote="t4"]i should have mentioned this earlier, but if you all would be so kind to reply with the following:
* Are you able to check the wiki at least once a week, perhaps even two weeks? * Why do you want to help? * What is your timezone[/quote]
[quote="t4"]Hey all, I've picked the admins for the wiki... we ended up with 5. If you didn't get picked, I am sorry. There was quite a lot of talented, trustworthy people who posted in this thread. If an admin has to step down in the future, I'll keep your enthusiasm you displayed in this thread in mind.
Congratulations to: [b]Scape-JAVA[/b] [b]m.dog311[/b] [b]Chassy13[/b] [b]Native^[/b] [b]Jmood[/b]
Here is a guide to what your job basically entails: http://imgur.com/a/DdNgS
Everyone who was selected, please post your wiki username in this thread so I can elevate your status to administrator. Please take the time to make sure your password and email are secure; failure to secure your account will lead to a revoked status.[/quote]

item.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Hey all, I’ve picked the admins for the wiki… we ended up with 5. If you didn’t get picked, I am sorry. There was quite a lot of talented, trustworthy people who posted in this thread. If an admin has to step down in the future, I’ll keep your enthusiasm you displayed in this thread in mind.

Congratulations to:
Scape-JAVA
m.dog311
Chassy13
Native^
Jmood

Here is a guide to what your job basically entails:
http://imgur.com/a/DdNgS

Everyone who was selected, please post your wiki username in this thread so I can elevate your status to administrator. Please take the time to make sure your password and email are secure; failure to secure your account will lead to a revoked status.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Are you able to check the Wiki at least once a week?: yes, three or four times a week
Why do you want to help?: I have a somewhat bad reputation on MoparScape and would like this opportunity to prove myself
What is your timezone?: GMT

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

More or less the only reason you would need to be an admin is for the blocking of accounts and some other higher permission things, any regular member can edit any page that isn’t locked.

Read full topic

US MNT/GMT-7
[/quote]

You can edit the Wiki now. This is for administrators to keep the Wiki clean of spam-bots.[/quote]
Well, I’d also be willing to check back often and clean the wiki. Seems pretty easy.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

On a separate note, are regular members allowed to edit/add to the wiki?

[ul][li] Are you able to check the wiki at least once a week, perhaps even two weeks? Yes[/li]
[li] Why do you want to help? The wiki has helped me a lot with making my server, I would like to return the favor if needed. I already visit the wiki once a twice a day (317 Login Protocol) [/li]
[li] What is your timezone? Est[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

* Are you able to check the wiki at least once a week, perhaps even two weeks? - Yes, I’m on everyday and could check it whenever I have time. I used to moderate everyday so I won’t forget about it.

* Why do you want to help? - The RS WIKI isn’t a highly known resource right now and I’d like to let it grow in popularity, and this obviously requires that it has safety and doesn’t get messed with. I feel like I’ve drifted away from being involved in this community after I resigned (apart from Project Notebook), and would like to step in again for something.

* What is your timezone - US Central, GMT - 5

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

* Are you able to check the wiki at least once a week, perhaps even two weeks? - I will be able to check everyday. I attend school on the internet and I would be able to keep this open on another tab and refresh everyso often to check for spammers.

* Why do you want to help? - Its a contribution to the community and I have plenty of time to spare and help. I feel its a learning curve because I have administrated other types of websites and servers as in another rsps community, a few of my own successful servers. Not to mention I have assembled my own websites. But never have I done anything with a wiki do I feel by letting me be a part of this, I will gain more knowledge in administrating websites and other communities.

* What is your timezone? - Idk what the GMT is but I’m mountain zone so yea. I think that’s GMT -7

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I wouldn’t mind doing it at all whatsoever!

  • Are you able to check the wiki at least once a week, perhaps even two weeks? Yes.
  • Why do you want to help? Well, I would like to prove me being trust-worthy throughout MoparScape, I don’t think it would hurt to at least attempt to see if I can do this, I want to expand what I can was given into what I can give.
  • What is your timezone EST.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins

item.description:

  • Why do you want to help? Gives me something to do around here.
  • What is your timezone EST

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for some RSWiki admins
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

  • Are you able to check the wiki at least once a week, perhaps even two weeks? I go on the wiki daily.
  • Why do you want to help? I use the wiki quite frequently actually, and I think it would be cool to help out on the wiki :o. I also want to contribute to something I use so frequently (in a way that I can).
  • What is your timezone Pacific

Read full topic
